title: Sulgar Road Shooting
content: Police in Jefferson County are investigating a drive by shooting. The shooting happened on Sunday afternoon along Sulgar Road in Pinecreek Township when a side by side driven by two white men both with brown hair drove past firing up to seven shots. A 64 year old man was walking along the road at the time and was shot in the hand. The victim says he heard another seven shots fired as the side by side continued down the road. Police are still looking for the men in the side by side.
